snippet: The members of the Federal Reserve’s policy-making committee barely discussed the possibility of a fourth round of asset purchases during their most recent meeting in mid-March.
abstract: Federal Reserve releases account of meeting showing that while its policy-making committee remains committed to its existing efforts to stimulate economic growth, there is no support for additional measures unless momentum slows or inflation settles below what the central bank considers healthy.
lead_paragraph: The members of the Federal Reserve’s policy-making committee barely discussed the possibility of a fourth round of asset purchases during their most recent meeting in mid-March.

headline.seo: Few Signs of Further Fed Action in Latest Minutes
headline.main: Federal Reserve Minutes Suggest No Bold Action
headline.print_headline: Federal Reserve Minutes Suggest No Bold Action
